title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Meet Gizmo: a TikTok for interactive, vibe-coded mini apps
items.description: Gizmo's app is like a TikTok for vibe-coded mini apps...and it's a lot of fun.

items.title: Amazon to begin testing AI tools for film and TV production next month
items.description: Amazon MGM Studios will reportedly begin a closed beta program in March to test its AI tools to help with film and TV production.

items.title: Cozey Neptune Sofa Bed Review: Firm but Flexible
items.description: This modular sleeper sofa allows buyers to design any seating configuration they want, if they don’t mind a solid surface.

items.title: Notepad++ Users, You May Have Been Hacked by China
items.description: Suspected Chinese state-backed hackers hijacked the Notepad++ update infrastructure to deliver a backdoored version of the popular free source code ed...

items.title: Measles Is Causing Brain Swelling in Children in South Carolina
items.description: In the ongoing measles outbreak in South Carolina that has infected more than 800 people, some children have developed a rare but serious complication...

items.title: Our Favorite Pixel Phone Is $100 Off
items.description: While the Pixel 9a isn't the fanciest offering, it is the best value, and it gets even better with a discount.

items.title: AI SRE Resolve AI confirms $125M raise, unicorn valuation
items.description: The two-year-old startup confirms that it closed a Series A led by Lightspeed at $1 billion valuation.

items.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX company town is getting a police department
items.description: The new department will have up to eight police officers and could be up and running in a few months.

items.title: A New AI Math Startup Just Cracked 4 Previously Unsolved Problems
items.description: Axiom says its AI found solutions to several long-standing math problems, a sign of the technology’s steadily advancing reasoning capabilities.

items.title: The Wayback Machine debuts a new plugin designed to fix the internet’s broken links problem
items.description: WordPress is helping the non-profit fight the scourge of "link rot."
